modName: Sword of the Ancient Tongues golden and no scabbard
summary: A retexture of the pole of the Sword of the Ancient Tongues and scabbard removed.
descriptionHtml:
I liked the SOAT, but the color did not fit my character too well. So I decided to retexture the pole of the sword into gold, in order to match my golden warrior. I also made the blade brighter.

At the same time, I removed its scabbard because in this game I like swords that leave completely your body once unsheated.

Since my character is a dual weilder, I also made a .nif file for this version of the no-scabbard sword for the DSR mod.
I already made a patch for the original and it was uploaded in the Dual Sheath Redux download page. Go check it out.
The 2HD version will still have a scabbard, I'll change that just if someone tells me to fo it.

And since the original author is so kind that gave absolute permission to use the file only if you give credit, I am able to share what I did :)

So here you have it, enjoy!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[color=#ff7700]Original Sword By:[/color] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10204660]Corvalho1[/url]
[color=#ff7700]Retexture and Mesh Edititng:[/color] [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/user/9802952-joedpa/]Joedpa[/url]
author: Corvalho1
